roleset.name: encode, scramble digital information

example.name: encrypt-v
example.text: If it installs successfully, ransomware encrypts text files and displays a ransom note demanding 200 dollars to supply decryption software to restore the data to its original form.

example.name: encryption-n: blank agent
example.text: Still, [*] encrypting corporate communications is only a partial remedy.

roleset.note: ENCRYPT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'encrypt' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from encrypt.01-v predicate notes)
